ESSENTIAL CANADIAN ELECTRIC BLUES !

INCREDIBLE HEAVY BLUES PSYCH LAID DOWN BY THIS FIRST INCARNATION OF THE GROUP, LAID DOWN WITH CONVICTION!!!.
VERY GUTSY VOCALS BY A ROBUST JOE MENDELSON. BASS BY PAUPERS PRODIGY DENNIS GERRARD, 
JUST BEFORE HE WAS ON THE OUTS FROM AN ACID CASUALTY. LP WAS ORIGINALLY NEVER DUE TO BE RELEASED
, LAID ALL THESE TRACKS DOWN MEANT ONLY AS A DEMO, BUT WHEN THE BAND WAS TOURING IN THE UK
ALLIED LABEL HEAD, JACK BOSWELL DECIDED TO GO AN RELEASE IT WITHOUT THE BANDS CONSENT.
IT'S ALL GOOD THOUGH AS THIS IS SOLID MATERIAL THEY LAID DOWN AND ONE OF THE GREAT WHITE BLUES ALBUMS. ON THE HYPER COLLECTABLE PARAGON LABEL THAT ALSO PLAYED HOST TO REIGN GHOST, FRANK MOTLEY, AND THIS LP IS JUST AS RARE AS ANY OF THEM. RECORDED IN TORONTO CANADA SEPT.5,9-1968
